Star Extension

1. Star Extension helps people to connect with followers and send NFTs to friends on social media platforms based on its ID aggregator.

2. Star provides a new curation approach to display NFTs on social media. Both Star Extension and websites will show NFTs restored in synthetic accounts and wallets once their social accounts are connected.

3. You could easily customize the showcase with Star Extension. Anyone who has installed Star Extension or visited Star Website will see your NFTs when browsing your profile.

Upcoming features for empowering creators: saving contents as an NFT, sending tokens to social accounts, batch airdrops, etc.
